name: Bullet Frenzy Offline
description:
A bullet hell for multiple players! Technically it's unfinished, but I'm releasing it as is and am unsure if I'll ever go back to it. Originally was going to be much more directly inspired by another bullet hell series if you couldn't tell!

Press the "f" key to toggle fullscreen mode.

Read more about the game here: https://www.neoxid501.com/bullet-frenzy-offline

Music Credit:

"Super Power Cool Dude" "Professor Umlaut" "Voltaic" "Aggressor" "Unholy Knight" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
